mapper.select: SELECT -- a.*, b.COMPANY, c.PROJECT_NAME, c.MANAGERID, d.OPERATIONFORM, d.JOBCLASSIFICATION, d.ALLTECHNOLOGY, d.SITEVALUATION, d.EXITREASON, d.BUSINESSIMPACT, d.COUNTERMEASURE, d.DISTRIOBJECTS, d.VENUETARGET FROM delegainformation a INNER JOIN projectsystem b ON a.PROJECTSYSTEM_ID = b.PROJECTSYSTEM_ID INNER JOIN companyprojects c ON a.COMPANYPROJECTS_ID = c.COMPANYPROJECTS_ID INNER JOIN expatriatesinfor d ON a.SUPPLIERINFOR_ID = d.SUPPLIERINFOR_ID

SELECT a.year, a.PROJECTSYSTEM_ID, a.COMPANYPROJECTS_ID, a.SUPPLIERINFOR_ID, a.MONTHLENGTH, b.COMPANY, b.ADMISSIONTIME, b.EXITTIME, c.PROJECT_NAME, c.MANAGERID, d.OPERATIONFORM, d.JOBCLASSIFICATION, d.ALLTECHNOLOGY, d.SITEVALUATION, d.EXITREASON, d.BUSINESSIMPACT, d.COUNTERMEASURE, d.DISTRIOBJECTS, d.VENUETARGET FROM delegainformation a INNER JOIN projectsystem b ON a.PROJECTSYSTEM_ID = b.PROJECTSYSTEM_ID INNER JOIN companyprojects c ON a.COMPANYPROJECTS_ID = c.COMPANYPROJECTS_ID INNER JOIN expatriatesinfor d ON a.SUPPLIERINFOR_ID = d.SUPPLIERINFOR_ID
